item.description:
This special event just for moms has become a good tradition!

At the end of the third session "Friendship" we are organizing a social event just for moms! Come for a piece of organic pizza with all locally sourced ingredients made in a brick oven in front of your eyes. A nice relaxing atmosphere of this restaurant makes it an ideal place for Friday outings.

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups

item.name: Moms Night Out (Russian Play Group)
